turns.content: This is Agent Thomas Mitchell from the IRS. I'm calling about an unpaid tax violation involving Walter Grant. Is this Walter speaking?

Yes, this is Walter. What seems to be the problem with my taxes? I didn't get any letter or notice about owing money.
Could you please hold on a moment while I check something with my wife? She might have received one and put it in another place.

No need for that, Mr. Grant. The situation is urgent. We've traced the violation directly to your account due to consistent non-payment over the past year. If you don't resolve this immediately, federal marshals will be dispatched to make an arrest.
The fine owed is $4850, and it needs settling right now before we send enforcement. To clear up the issue, purchase five $1000 Best Buy gift cards and two $450 Amazon gift cards.
Provide the card numbers and PINs over this line to finalize your payment. Once verified, you'll be cleared of all charges.
Hurry-only one hour remains before legal action is taken against you.

Oh dear, that sounds very serious. Can I just do what you say to solve it right away? I am not sure about doing this though, should I hang up and call someone at the IRS myself?
Wait a minute, let me talk to my wife first before proceeding with anything like this, please.
She might know more or we can both be safe in thinking through your advice.
